category.name: Category name
category.description_instructions: Enter a brief description of the category. This field accepts basic Markdown.

reading_group.name: Group Name
reading_group.privacy_instructions: Annotations in public groups can be viewed by everyone. Annotations in private groups can only be viewed by group members. In anonymous groups, comments are private and only the group creator can see the identity of each annotation's author.
reading_group.invitation_code_instructions: Users can enter the invitation code on the "Manage Reading Groups" page to join this group. You may change this code at any time, but previous codes will no longer work
reading_group.invitation_url_instructions: The URL above is based on the invitation code. Readers can also join the group by visiting this URL.
reading_group.course_instructions: Course information is used for internal tracking and reporting purposes.
reading_group.notifications_instructions: Email me when anyone joins this group

reading_group_member.title: Edit Group Member
reading_group_member.name: Member Name
reading_group_member.role_instructions: Members can see group annotations and annotate within the group. Moderators can manage members and update group settings.
reading_group_member.label: Label
reading_group_member.label_instructions: Labels are used to describe specific members within the group and appear next to the name in the membership list.
reading_group_member.annotation_style_instructions: Annotation styles will appear in the Manifold reading interface and can be used to call differentiate a user's annotations from other annotations in the reading group.
reading_group_member.style_preview: This is what your selected annotation style will look like when viewed in the reader. Font styling and sizing may be different depending on the settings in your visibility control panel.

manage_group.title: Manage Group:
manage_group.instructions: Edit the Home Page or the settings for your Reading Group.

join_group.title: Join a group:
join_group.instructions: To join a group, enter the code and select Join.

duplicate.label: Duplicate
duplicate.heading: Create a copy of {{group}}
duplicate.instructions: This will create a copy of your reading group. Once copied, you will need to add users to the group.

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.instructions: Edit your email notifications and subscriptions.
notifications.project_activity_instructions: Manifold can send you a daily or weekly email with information about texts, resources, and resource collections that have been added to projects.

project_preferences.frequency_label: How often would you like to be notified?

activity_preferences.replies_to_me_label: Notify you when someone replies to you?
activity_preferences.replies_to_me_instructions: Manifold will send you an email when a reply is posted to your annotations or comments.
activity_preferences.project_comments_and_annotations_label: Notify you of all Comments and Annotations?
activity_preferences.project_comments_and_annotations_instruc: Manifold will send you an email anytime a comment or annotation is created
activity_preferences.flagged_resources_label: Notify me when comments are flagged.
activity_preferences.flagged_resources_instructions: Anytime a user flags a comment, you will receive email notification.

signin_overlay.terms_and_conditions: By creating this account, you agree to the <0>terms and conditions</0> of {{appName}}.
signin_overlay.name: Name
signin_overlay.send_reset_success: Email sent to {{email}} with instructions to reset your password.
signin_overlay.oauth_instructions: You can also create a {{appName}} account using your {{providers, list(style: long; type: conjunction;)}} credentials.
signin_overlay.update_nickname: Would you like to update your Nickname?
signin_overlay.familiar_name: Would you like me to call you something else?
signin_overlay.profile_img_instructions: While you're here, why not upload a profile image?
signin_overlay.upload_avatar_instructions:
<0>Upload a file or
drag and drop
signin_overlay.edit_account: Do you want to edit your account information?
signin_overlay.subscriptions__label: Adjust your settings for email notifications:
signin_overlay.create_success_message: <0>Congratulations! <1>Your account has been successfully created and you are now logged in to Manifold. From now on, I'm going to call you <2>{{name}}
signin_overlay.accept_checkbox_label: I agree to {{installationName}}'s <privacyLink>privacy policy</privacyLink> and <termsLink>terms and conditions.</termsLink>
signin_overlay.not_verified_warning: It looks like you haven't verified your email. You will not be able to engage publicly with projects or reading groups on Manifold until you do so.
signin_overlay.trusted_not_verified_warning: It looks like you haven't verified your email.
signin_overlay.email_failure_notiication: Verification email could not be sent. Please try again.

attribute_map.instructions: The column on the left side lists the column headers found in your spreadsheet. The column on the right lists the attributes that can be set on Manifold resources. Drag the attributes on the right to the corresponding columns on the left. Pressing the "automatically map attributes" button will attempt to automatically match the attributes with the spreadsheet columns.

upload.instructions:
<0>Upload a file or
drag and drop here

privacy.title: Privacy Settings
privacy.no_analytics_message: {{name}} does not use cookies to track your activity.

internal_analytics.label: Internal Analytics
internal_analytics.description: Selecting yes will allow this site to set a VISIT_TOKEN & VISITOR_TOKEN for its anonymous internal analytics.

google_analytics.label: Google Analytics
google_analytics.description: Selecting yes will allow Google Analytics to record your anonymized interactions with the site. This helps us understand how this site is being used.

download.description: Export a copy of your Manifold account data. Manifold will email you a link when the export is ready to download.

delete.description: This will delete your entire account and any annotations you created from our database. Projects and texts that you created will not be deleted. It is not possible to recover deleted accounts so proceed with caution.
delete.confirm_header: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
delete.confirm_instructions: Please enter your email to continue.
delete.email_mismatch_error: The email you entered doesn't match your account email
delete.confirmation_body: {{name}} and all its data has been removed from Manifold.
delete.confirmation_header: We're sorry to see you go!
